member.name: M:MatchingGameVB.Form1.AssignIconsToSquares
member.summary: Assign each icon from the list of icons to a random square.

member.name: M:MatchingGameVB.Form1.label_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Every label's Click event is handled by this event handler.

member.name: M:MatchingGameVB.Form1.Timer1_Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This timer is started when the player clicks two icons that don't match, so it counts three quarters of a second and then turns itself off and hides both icons.

member.name: M:MatchingGameVB.Form1.CheckForWinner
member.summary: Check every icon to see if it is matched, by comparing its foreground color to its background color. If all of the icons are matched, the player wins.

member.name: P:MatchingGameVB.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MatchingGameVB.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:MatchingGameVB.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
